name: npm Global Package Installer
description: Install global npm packages for Node.js development environments

packages.description: Comma-separated list of global npm packages to install (e.g., 'typescript,@angular/cli,nodemon')

registry.description: Custom npm registry URL (optional, defaults to npmjs.org)

installLatest.description: Install latest versions of packages (append @latest to package names)

updateNpm.description: Update npm to the latest version before installing packages
